languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 Willpower.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the Overseer's {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking psychic powers do not count toward the attack limit per turn and deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their maximum wounds. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} and cannot dodge attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 Willpower.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the Overseer's {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking psychic powers do not count toward the attack limit per turn and deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their maximum wounds. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} and cannot dodge attacks while in this area.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} находится в 4 клетках от псайберворона, при {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретрансляции{/g} атакующей {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} она наносит на {uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% больше урона и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Также в этот момент надзиратель получает урон, равный 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}{/g} Кроме того, в этой области надзиратель {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлен{/g} и не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyken, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} saldırı amaçlı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} +%{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} daha fazla hasar verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz. Ancak ruhsiber kuzgun saldırı amaçlı bir ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar hasara maruz kalır. Ayrıca Gözetmen bu alandayken {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g} ve saldırılardan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınamaz{/g}.

Ancak ruhsiber kuzgun saldırı amaçlı bir ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar hasara maruz kalır. Ayrıca Gözetmen bu alandayken {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g} ve saldırılardan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınamaz{/g}.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyken, {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarılan{/g} saldırı amaçlı ruhsezi güçleri +%{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} daha fazla hasar verir ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz. Ancak ruhsiber kuzgun saldırı amaçlı bir ruhsezi gücü {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} Gözetmen, maksimum sağlık puanının %10'u kadar hasara maruz kalır. Ayrıca Gözetmen bu alandayken yavaşlar ve saldırılardan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınamaz{/g}.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Mientras se encuentre en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo, los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} ofensivos {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitidos{/g} por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} infligen un +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % de daño adicional y no cuentan para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}. No obstante, cada vez que el psicocuervo {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico ofensivo, el supervisor sufre tanto daño como el 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Además, mientras se encuentre en esta zona, el supervisor queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} y no puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ataques.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
El psicocuervo recibe +30 de Voluntad.
Mientras se encuentre en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al psicocuervo, los poderes psíquicos ofensivos {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitidos{/g} por el supervisor infligen un +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % de daño adicional y no cuentan para el límite de ataques por turno. No obstante, cada vez que el psicocuervo {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} un poder psíquico ofensivo, el supervisor sufre tanto daño como el 10 % de sus heridas máximas. Además, mientras se encuentre en esta zona, el supervisor queda ralentizado y no puede esquivar ataques.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高30点。
当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}与生化渡鸦的距离不超过4格时，监察官的攻击类{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}进行{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}时，造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}%，且不计入{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合的攻击上限{/g}。不过，每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}攻击性灵能能力时，监察官都会受到伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。除此之外，当监察官处于此区域内时会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
生化渡鸦的意志提高30点。
当监察官与生化渡鸦的距离不超过4格时，监察官的攻击类灵能能力进行{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}时，造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}%，且不计入每回合攻击上限。不过，每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}攻击性灵能能力时，监察官都会受到伤害，等同于最大生命值的10%。除此之外，当监察官处于此区域内时会陷入减速状态，且无法闪避攻击。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
In einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben verursachen die {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Angriffskräfte{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % mehr Schaden und werden nicht für das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} gewertet. Allerdings erleidet der Aufseher jedes Mal, wenn der Psitech-Rabe eine psionische Angriffskraft {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}überträgt{/g}, Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Zudem ist der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} und kann Angriffen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}, solange er sich in dem Bereich befindet.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +30 Willenskraft.
In einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben verursachen die {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}übertragenen{/g} psionischen Angriffskräfte des Aufsehers +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % mehr Schaden und werden nicht für das Angriffslimit pro Zug gewertet. Allerdings erleidet der Aufseher jedes Mal, wenn der Psitech-Rabe eine psionische Angriffskraft {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}überträgt{/g}, Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner maximalen Wunden. Zudem ist der Aufseher verlangsamt und kann Angriffen nicht ausweichen, solange er sich in dem Bereich befindet.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +30.
Tant que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} offensifs {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayés{/g} infligent +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % de dégâts supplémentaires et ne sont pas déduits du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g}. En revanche, chaque fois que la psyber-corneille {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un pouvoir psychique offensif, le surveillant subit des dégâts égaux à 10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Le surveillant subit également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} et ne peut pas {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} tant qu'il restera dans ce rayon.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de Force mentale de +30.
Tant que le surveillant se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, les pouvoirs psychiques offensifs {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayés{/g} infligent +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697} % de dégâts supplémentaires et ne sont pas déduits du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. En revanche, chaque fois que la psyber-corneille {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un pouvoir psychique offensif, le surveillant subit des dégâts égaux à 10 % de ses blessures maximum. Le surveillant subit également l'effet Ralentissement et ne peut pas esquiver tant qu'il restera dans ce rayon.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+30される。
サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルにいる間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の攻撃は+{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}%のダメージを与え、ターンごとの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}にカウントされない。しかし、サイバーレイヴンが超能力の攻撃を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、監督者は{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の10%と同じダメージを受ける。さらに、監督者は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}になり、このエリアにいる間攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できない。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+30される。
サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルにいる間、監督者の{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の攻撃は+{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}%のダメージを与え、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。しかし、サイバーレイヴンが超能力の攻撃を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、監督者は最大の傷の10%と同じダメージを受ける。さらに、監督者はスロウになり、このエリアにいる間攻撃を回避できない。

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+30される。
サイバーレイヴンの半径4セルにいる間、監督者の{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継がれた{/g}超能力の攻撃は+{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}%のダメージを与え、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。しかし、サイバーレイヴンが超能力の攻撃を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}とき、監督者は最大の傷の10%と同じダメージを受ける。さらに、監督者はスロウになり、このエリアにいる間攻撃を回避できない。

languages.text:
Псайберворон получает +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} находится в 4 клетках от псайберворона, при {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретрансляции{/g} атакующей {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} она наносит на {uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% больше урона и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}. Также в этот момент надзиратель получает урон, равный 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}{/g} Кроме того, в этой области надзиратель {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлен{/g} и не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
While in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayed{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} deal +{uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% more damage and do not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}. But, whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} an attacking psychic power, the Overseer suffers damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. Additionally, the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks while in this area.

traits.locale_text:
Псайберворон получает +30 к Воле.
Когда надзиратель находится в 4 клетках от псайберворона, при {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретрансляции{/g} атакующей психосилы она наносит на {uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% больше урона и не входит в лимит атак на ход. Также в этот момент надзиратель получает урон, равный 10% от своего максимального здоровья.{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}{/g} Кроме того, в этой области надзиратель замедлен и не может уклоняться от атак.

Псайберворон получает +30 к Воле.
Когда надзиратель находится в 4 клетках от псайберворона, при {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретрансляции{/g} атакующей психосилы она наносит на {uip|Damage|de0326772ec8408d8b8e1614cec43697}% больше урона и не входит в лимит атак на ход. Также в этот момент надзиратель получает урон, равный 10% от своего максимального здоровья.{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}{/g} Кроме того, в этой области надзиратель замедлен и не может уклоняться от атак.
